Description: Options for operating mode Profile Position.Determines the reference position for relativepositioning:0: Relative with reference to the previous targetposition of the profile generator1: Not supported2: Relative with reference to the actual position ofthe motorModified settings become active the next time themotor moves.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 60F2:0hModbus 6960Profibus 6960CIP 127.1.24ModbusTCP 6960EtherCAT 60F2:0hPROFINET 6960
